articles.author: Joe Stanley-Smith
articles.title: Greenland’s PM tells Trump: ‘We do not belong to others’ - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Jens-Frederik Nielsen rebuts U.S. president’s comments that the U.S. will ‘get’ Greenland.
articles.content: Nielsen wants Greenland ultimately to achieve independence through economic self-reliance. The island is part of the Kingdom of Denmark, which sends it hundreds of millions of euros a year in subsidi… [+597 chars]

articles.author: Kieran Burke
articles.title: German space rocket explodes seconds into test flight - DW (English)
articles.description: A German start-up built a rocket with the hope of launching satellites into orbit from Europe in the future. But the test flight, the first of its kind from continental Europe, failed.
articles.content:
An orbital rocket launched from a Norwegian spaceport, the first launch of its kind from European soil, crashed seconds after lift-off on Sunday.
The German start-up company that built the rocket, I… [+2599 chars]
